selectJobCategoryByID: SELECT * FROM jobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? or NameJobCategory = ?
selectUserNotActivated: SELECT ua.UserAccountID, ua.Email, ua.FullName, ua.IsMale, ua.PhoneNumber, ua.Place, ua.Image, ua.PersonID,  DATE_FORMAT(ua.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateAccount, ua.PointsAverage , ujc.CategoryID, jc.NameJobCategory, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateJobCategory FROM useraccounts as ua INNER JOIN userjobcategories  AS ujc on ua.UserAccountID = ujc.UserWorkerID INNER JOIN jobcategories AS jc ON jc.CategoryID = ujc.CategoryID WHERE ujc.ActiveStatus = ? AND ua.UserTypeID = ?;
selectCVActivated: select ujc.CategoryID, jc.NameJobCategory, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, ujc.ImageStore, DATE_FORMAT(ua.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') as DateCreateAccount, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') as DateCreateCV from userjobcategories as ujc inner join jobcategories as jc on ujc.CategoryID = jc.CategoryID inner join useraccounts as ua on ua.UserAccountID = ujc.UserWorkerID where ujc.UserWorkerID = ? and ujc.ActiveStatus = ?
insertJobCategoryByCategoryID: INSERT INTO userjobcategories(CategoryID, UserWorkerID, Exprience, Qualifications, GeneralInformation, ImageStore) SELECT ?,?,?,?,?,? WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM userjobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? and UserWorkerID = ?) LIMIT 1
updateActiveCV: UPDATE userjobcategories SET ActiveStatus = 1, ActiveDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UserAdminActive = ? WHERE CategoryID = ? AND UserWorkerID = ?
updateNotActivatedCV: UPDATE userjobcategories SET Exprience = ?, Qualifications = ?, GeneralInformation = ?, ImageStore = ? WHERE CategoryID = ? AND UserWorkerID = ?
deleteCV: DELETE FROM userjobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? AND UserWorkerID = ? AND ActiveStatus = 0
